Generated Narrative: SearchParameter location-id

LocationIdSearchParameter

Parameter _id:token

Searches based on the location uuid field for the location record eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Location?_id={uuid}

ResourceLocation
Expression(none)
Target ResourcesLocation
Multiples
  • multipleAnd: It's up to the server whether the parameter may repeat in order to specify multiple values that must all be true
  • multipleOr: It's up to the server whether the parameter can have multiple values (separated by comma) where at least one must be true

name: LocationIdSearchParameter
description: Searches based on the location uuid field for the location record eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Location?_id={uuid}
